content: I ordered toner cartridges a week ago. There was no indication they were backordered. When I hadn't received a ship notification I checked and they were listed as  backordered. I also got an email notification that higher capacity cartridges were in stock. I called to change my order to the higher capacity ones ( at the same price). The support person said the backordered (TN433) were coming in, but the higher capacity ones (TN436) that I had received a 'now in stock' email about had not arrival date. I went online and via chat asked to cancel my original order (72934001). I then orderd the TN436 cartridges and were told (via the chat person) that they were in stock. I hope I am not sorry for having done business with LD Products.
author: Jeff

review_after_purchase.author: Jeff
review_after_purchase.content: Was interested in hi-capacity cartridges for my HL-L8360CDW. Product was shown as coming soon, signed up for notification and ordered regular cartridges with discount code BLKFRDY. Cartridges didn't arrive as expected and online showed as backordered. Got notice high-capacity cartridges were in stock. Called to cancel original (backordered) cartridges. Was told high-capacity ones weren't in stock. Called again and was able to order high-capacity ones. Packages arrived, missing additional black cartridge I had ordered despite it being listed in the shipping invoice. Called customer service and was told it would be sent out in separate shipment.  LD seems very disorganized and confused. I wasn't told original cartridges ordered were out of stock. Was told high-capacity ones weren't in stock despite my getting email from LD saying they were. Shipment left our a cartridge I had been charged for.

review_after_purchase.author: tdinch
review_after_purchase.content: I usually don't give a '10' as a rating because who is actually 'perfect'? When I first received my shipment the postal service had taped it up with a message saying it was damaged. I immediately called LD customer support and they remedied things for me and shipped the ink that was missing. I offered to provide a picture of the package to prove that it was truly damaged and they did not require that.The person I spoke with was kind, willing to chat, was U.S. based and very knowledgeable. I wouldn't mind offshore customer service as long as they understood my needs (not one of those people that require a U.S. based person). Although I have not had time to install the ink cartridges I have 100% confidence that if I do have an issue I will be met with the same kindness as I was before.LD Products has earned my business and likely my loyalty for years to come.

review_after_purchase.author: GaryU
review_after_purchase.content: I marked the wrong box at the beginning of the survey. I have not received the entire order as yet. but expect to in the next few days. This is the second time that I placed this order. The first order was a larger order, meaning that there were several more items, but it was cancelled  by LD Products. One of the items was to be placed on back order, then for some unknown reason LD Products cancelled the whole order, but did not notify me for several weeks. tThis order evidently was delivered by two separate shippers. I received one item via USPS, not in the best of shape, but acceptable. The second item is at this moment sitting at a UPS facility waiting to be delivered tomorrow. I us a P.O. Box for my mail delivery because we do not have physical USPS delivery. Well UPS will not deliver to a USPS Box so they sent notice that if I did not came into town (25 miles one way) to pick up the order, or the order will be returned to the shipper. If the shipper had notified me that they needed a Physical address I would have given them one. I have had other problems with LD with prior orders but this one is the one that will be the last.

review_after_purchase.author: Mickey
review_after_purchase.content: Placed my order on 09/17, received order confirmation same day, after 3 days had not received  Email of order shipped. Called them and was told that one of my items was out of stock. The website said that it was in stock. Checked as soon as I got off the phone. Was told that they could ship a partial order, but I would have to pay shipping on both orders.Informed them that if the order didn't ship soon I would cancel my order. Order shipped Email came the next day, delivery was 1 day earlier than estimated. Received the products, the order contained LD products, and products from G&G, installed products, got error message from printer on 2 of the cartridges. Called LD customer service and was told that this was normal. The website says 100% compatible, satisfaction guarantee, the G&G cartridge was one of the cartridges causing the error message, it also reported 50% ink. .  Customer service gave me excuses as to why the error messages only appeared on 2 of the cartridges, and that the same cause of the error messages causes the ink level to read incorrectly.  Have no problems with the other parts of the order, so far. I probably won't order fro them again as their quality control is very poor.Not to mention that they don't keep the info on their website up to date. I'm sure that I can find another supplier that has more reliable products and service.

content: I have usually had a good on line ordering experience with LD products.  Unfortunately , today was not a good day for your company.  Your LD Website shows a FALL sale with 18% off orders of $100 or more.  The code listed was CORN.  I psuhed the APPLY CODE button but it would not work.  I typed in CORN as instructed, it said it was an invalid code.  After spending 15 unsatisfactory minutes with your CHAT person I still got no results.  They did not evem know there was a FALL sale.  How can that be?????   So I got on the phone with your customer service employee.  She did not know you had a FALL sale going on either.  I told her to check the site.  She did, and told me to punch in FALL as the code rather than the advertised CORN Code.  It worked.  No real concern that the code was wrong or that they didn't even know there was a sale going on.  Strange way to run a business, chat team and customer service team.  I thought LD products was a well run machine but I was wrong.
